name: conformably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is in agreement with something: She firmly believes that happiness comes from living conformably with nature. The new queen swore that she would govern conformably to the constitution.
More examplesFewer examplesHe always acted conformably to his mother's wishes.Everything was arranged conformably to Sikh doctrine.It is the duty of the court to decide the case conformably to the law.Every citizen has the right to obtain justice conformably to the laws of the land.
